price: 14. Tokkel Nabii Mucammadow koo kee ко luk yeemene mari ama koros isin fan ken как sectaanam siinik cinecnik, toysa moominiiney isin ama Qhuraan cagalah Yalli caglitah yan ixxigal isi farmoytal obiseh yan kitab kinnim ixiga, isin cakkil yaqbuden Yalli anee waam ixiga inki Yallak sa, tokkel isin Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amri oggolteenii ?
arabic: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلۡمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-illam yastajībū lakum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā unzila biʿil'mi al-lahi wa-an lā ilāha illā huwa fahal antum mus'limūna
